hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is

for everything and anything let's get

is that everything is connected and once

going to change and we can see that very
soon there will be news that is going to

this is going to affect everything
anything and everything it's all
connected and what we've been seeing

all know this we've been following it
for a very long time we know the numbers
are manipulated we know GDP unemployment
you name it all manipulated gold silver
suppressed everything is manipulated
here and then all of a sudden Trump
comes into the picture
and the economy is doing better than
it's ever done before this is on purpose
this is part of the plan because what is
happening here is Trump is making it
look like everything is fantastic now if
there is news if the Fed does raise the
rates which they are doing and it brings

took on the responsibility of the stock
market but if there is news that comes

this has been the plan all along
to make it look like using the

been using the central banks have been
using using that manipulation to work
against them we know the economy's not
we can't repair this economy we can't

moved our manufacturing out of this
country
they set up terrible trade deals are the
the central bank the Fed has devalued
the dollar since their inception we've
come off the gold standard and the
education system has gone down the drain
and this has an effect over time and we
can see right now the United States is

we have the Marines we have equipment do

from their money printing so the only

to have news come out and say wow the

country people going to react to this
the markets gonna fall and we can see
we're heading in this direction if we
start to look at these numbers like

they don't even make sense anymore
I mean right now jobless claims they're
down to 49 year lows now why is this
let's compare this to the 90s GDP in the
90s was much stronger than today initial
jobless claims had 9 years of recovery
and we see that in the 90s
going into the 2000 we have 300,000 jobs
verse 210 thousand jobs that is the

it's not tied to the duration it's not

this
it's manipulated and we've been
following this in tracking this we know
there's hundreds of millions of people
out of work looking for work we see the
ADP employment growth has slowed to the

September December and when you look at

everything just all of a sudden
